appName.message: Tulong sa Pagsusuri ng Hiling na Pagkuha sa BitBucket
appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Pinapayagan ka ng ekstensiyon na ito na hudyatan ang mga indibidwal na file sa isang hiling na pagkuha hangga't susuriin
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

doneReviewing.description: The text shown on the UI button when a file *has not* been marked as reviewed.

reviewed.description: The text shown on the UI button when a file *has* been marked as reviewed.
